title: Rca Data Schema
description: Basic rock properties evaluated on an intact plug sample via a Routine Core Analysis (RCA) technique that may include porosity, air permeability, klinkenberg permeability, water/gas/oil saturations, grain density, bulk density, plug volumetrics and weights through various individual methods like Boyle's Law, brine saturation, Klinkenberg correction, and Dean Stark.
